text:
Sqlite3Error in 'Many to Many Associations with sqlite3#method_missing with a has relationship method with arguments should affect the query used to load the Collection'
ambiguous column name: articles.id
Query: SELECT "articles"."id" FROM "articles" INNER JOIN "articles" ON ("articles"."id" = "articles"."article_id") INNER JOIN "articles_authors" ON ("articles"."id" = "articles_authors"."article_id") WHERE ("articles"."article_id" IN (2)) ORDER BY "articles"."id"
